publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3004# Marilyn Livingstone: Solvent Abuse-That the Parliament recognises the continued threat posed by solvent abuse; acknowledges the continued need to combat solvent abuse, and believes that the Scottish Executive should investigate and pilot new preventative measures such as the test purchasing scheme, aimed at reducing underage sales of potentially abusive products, which has been successfully applied throughout England and Wales, and actively increase awareness among young people of the devastating effects of solvent abuse.

S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Sarah Boyack*, Brian Adam*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Janis Hughes*, Margaret Jamieson*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr John McAllion*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Scott Barrie*, Angus MacKay*, Rhoda Grant*

S1M-3004# Marilyn Livingstone: Solvent Abuse-That the Parliament recognises the continued threat posed by solvent abuse; acknowledges the continued need to combat solvent abuse, and believes that the Scottish Executive should investigate and pilot new preventative measures such as the test purchasing scheme, aimed at reducing underage sales of potentially abusive products, which has been successfully applied throughout England and Wales, and actively increase awareness among young people of the devastating effects of solvent abuse. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Sarah Boyack, Brian Adam, Brian Fitzpatrick, Janis Hughes, Margaret Jamieson, Richard Lochhead, Mr John McAllion, Karen Whitefield, Mr David Davidson, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Scott Barrie, Angus MacKay, Rhoda Grant, Helen Eadie*, Elaine Thomson*, David Mundell*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Tommy Sheridan*, Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Trish Godman*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Robin Harper*, Kay Ullrich*, Christine Grahame*, Kate Maclean*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*, Nora Radcliffe*, Irene Oldfather*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Michael Russell*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Susan Deacon*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-3004# Solvent Abuse (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
